channel.title: Venues on Sports Club
channel.description: Recent content in Venues on Sports Club

item.title: Athletics Track
item.description: Full athletics stadium with 400m track and comprehensive field event facilities including long jump, high jump, and throwing areas.

item.title: Main Training Field
item.description: Primary training facility for most teams. Features modern changing rooms, floodlights for evening sessions, and comfortable spectator seating.

item.title: Tennis Courts
item.description: Professional tennis facility with four outdoor courts and a comfortable clubhouse for team meetings and social events.
